page.title: 09The painter and Decorator
page.content: Painting and decorating are skillful jobs. You have to have the right measurements and the right colours that people want. In painting you sometimes have to paint windows but before you do it you sometimes have to make them smooth with sandpaper and you sometimes have to put putty in the cracks on the windows. In painting and decorating youdon't choose the wallpaper. The people tell you what they want and you have to be very accurate when you put the wallpaper up. Before you start the job you have to work out how much it will be. Paul Phillips
